name: Maggie Pie
description:
For Global Game Jam 2019.

Help little Maggie Pie leave her comfort zone to assemble the window of her world view. Beware of Prowler the Owl who is only out for himself, but thankfully Maggie Pie has you to help her.

Credits
  • Cat King David Kahn
  • From Kitty to Karen Morrison
  • Someone is in the Kitchen with Dana Kimball
  • Kevin Lim - The Purple Flame
  • Christian Smith - That One Guy
